doc:
John DiMaggio https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_DiMaggio 0 John DiMaggio (; born September 4, 1968) is an American voice actor and comedian. His voice features as Bender from Futurama, Jake the Dog on Adventure Time, Marcus Fenix in the Gears of War series, Dr. Drakken on Kim Possible, Brother Blood on Teen Titans, Sandman and Hammerhead on Spectacular Spider-Man, Aquaman in Batman: The Brave and the Bold, the Scotsman on Samurai Jack, Schnitzel on Chowder, Rico in The Penguins of Madagascar and King Zøg on Disenchantment. John_DiMaggio ( ; born September_4_,_1968 ) is an_American_voice_actor_and_comedian . His_voice features as Bender from Futurama , Jake the_Dog on Adventure_Time , Marcus_Fenix in the_Gears of War_series , Dr._Drakken on Kim_Possible , Brother_Blood on Teen_Titans , Sandman and Hammerhead on Spectacular_Spider-Man , Aquaman in Batman : The_Brave and the_Bold , the_Scotsman on Samurai_Jack , Schnitzel on Chowder , Rico in The_Penguins of Madagascar_and_King_Zøg on Disenchantment .
